Control Name: 2.18.1 Regulatory and governance requirements of this workload are known and well understood
Control Statement: .Regulatory requirements may mandate that operational data, such as application logs and metrics, remain within a certain geo-political region. This has obvious implications for how the application should be operationalized.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 2.18 What operational excellence allowances for security have you made?
